note.p: Birth: Near Sunderland, County Durham, England (21 March 1797 or 1798)
Death: West Hartlepool, County Durham (20 or 21 November 1860)
Notes: Listed as defaulter on PL for 1847 and did not appear on PL after that year. Boase gives birth and death dates as 21 March 1797 and 21 November 1860; DNB gives the other dates.
